newsitem.title: CANADA: Toronto stocks open mixed and directionless.
newsitem.headline: Toronto stocks open mixed and directionless.

text.p: * Toronto stocks opened mixed on Wednesday with no strong pull either way. * Winners edged out losers 225 to 188, 210 traded flat. * Turnover of 7.5 million shares worth C$131 million.
Most of Toronto's 14 sub-indexes traded firmer, led by transportation and key banks.
* Shares in Newbridge Networks Corp lost 4.80 to 64.85, topping Toronto's most actives.
It had released preliminary estimates of its first quarter 1998 results, saying revenues from its enterprise networking division could deviate by five percent from fourth quarter figures.
* Royal Bank of Canada rose 1.10 to 67.10 in moderate dealings.
